info.name: Alpha-Match Api-Server
info.description:
GraphQL API Collection for Alpha-Match Api-Server

Includes:
- Skill Categories (Caching Test)
- Search Matches (CANDIDATE/RECRUITER modes)
- Recruit Detail
- Candidate Detail
- Dashboard Statistics

request.description:
Search for job openings (Recruits) matching candidate's skills.

Mode: CANDIDATE (Job Seeker searching for jobs)
Skills: Array of skill names
Experience: "0-2 Years", "3-5 Years", "6-9 Years", "10+ Years", or "" (no filter)

Returns:
- matches: Top matching recruits with similarity scores
- vectorVisualization: 2D visualization data

Note: Description field is excluded for list view (performance optimization)

Search for candidates matching job requirements.

Mode: RECRUITER (Recruiter searching for candidates)
Skills: Array of skill names
Experience: "0-2 Years", "3-5 Years", "6-9 Years", "10+ Years", or "" (no filter)

Returns:
- matches: Top matching candidates with similarity scores
- vectorVisualization: 2D visualization data

Test different experience filters:

Change the 'experience' variable to:
- "0-2 Years" - Entry level
- "3-5 Years" - Mid level
- "6-9 Years" - Senior level
- "10+ Years" - Expert level
- "" (empty string) - No filter, all experience levels

Verify that results are filtered correctly based on experience_years column.

Fetch detailed information for a specific recruit.

Replace 'REPLACE-WITH-ACTUAL-UUID' with a real recruit_id from:
1. Run 'Search Matches' query first
2. Copy an 'id' from the matches array
3. Paste it here

Returns:
- All recruit metadata (position, company, experience, etc.)
- Full description (recruit_description.long_description)
- All skills for this recruit

Example UUID format: "b9a1303e-dd0c-5ed1-8f62-be2bc4c7da4f"

Fetch detailed information for a specific candidate.

Replace 'REPLACE-WITH-ACTUAL-UUID' with a real candidate_id from:
1. Run 'Search Matches - RECRUITER Mode' query first
2. Copy an 'id' from the matches array
3. Paste it here

Returns:
- All candidate metadata (position category, experience, etc.)
- Full description (candidate_description.original_resume)
- All skills for this candidate

Get dashboard statistics for skill demand by category.

Mode:
- CANDIDATE: Returns recruit statistics (job openings by skill)
- RECRUITER: Returns candidate statistics (candidates by skill)

Returns category-grouped skill counts for visualization.

Change userMode variable to:
- "CANDIDATE" - View job market statistics
- "RECRUITER" - View candidate pool statistics
